verbs.description: [ARG0: Former Trump campaign chairman Paul Manafort] [V: offered] [ARG1: to give Oleg Deripaska " private briefings " about the campaign just days earlier] .
[ARG0: Former Trump campaign chairman Paul Manafort] offered to [V: give] [ARG2: Oleg Deripaska] [ARG1: " private briefings " about the campaign] [ARGM-TMP: just days earlier] .
Former Trump campaign chairman Paul Manafort offered to give Oleg Deripaska " private briefings " about the campaign just [V: days] earlier .
